title: A Tale of Two Cities
author: Charles Dickens
summary: A historical novel set in London and Paris before and during the French Revolution.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties that follows the life of Jay Gatsby.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
author: Hergé
summary: A reporter embarks on a series of exciting adventures across the world.

title: Batman Year One
author: Frank Miller
summary: The beginning stages of Batman's journey as Gotham's protector.

title: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
summary: An open-world adventure game set in the expansive kingdom of Hyrule.

title: Elden Ring
summary: An action role-playing game in a dark fantasy setting created by Hidetaka Miyazaki.
